full_threads.body: Fwd: POSTCARD.docx

Hi James,


We've updated the copy in the event website page and in the A6 postcard.


Please let us know if it's as it should.


https://hssaustralia.com.au/latest-techniques-in-orthopaedics/

Thanks

Hi Joao


Can we just add the following line to the postcard …


and techniques available in Orthopaedics.


NOTE: Pending for CPD points to the RACGP QI&CPD Program

Hi Heath


Can we add the following wording onto the following page …


https://hssaustralia.com.au/latest-techniques-in-orthopaedics/


FULL DAY Category 1 | CPD 40 Points
(Limited availability)


CHANGE TO ….


FULL DAY Category 1 | CPD 40 Points
(Limited availability)


Pending for CPD points to the RACGP QI&CPD Program


THANKS

Hi James,


You can now see the doctors profiles updated in HSS website.


https://hssaustralia.com.au/specialist/associate-professor-andrew-davidson/
https://hssaustralia.com.au/specialist/dr-farid-meybodi/


Regarding the mailchimp newsletter, the specialists images and links are updated as well and linking to the specialists page in HSS website.


Thanks

Hi James,


Sure, can you let me know where would you like me to add this content? Should it be as a post or HSS specialist page?


Thanks

Also can we change Farid Meybodi’s page to the attached content and photo


JAMES

Hi Joao


Can we crop Farid Meybodi photo to be the same size as Andrew Davidson


Also..Davidson’s profile needs to click through to a page. See attached.


CHEERS


JAMES

Great, no problem at all. I'll let Heath know as well once he gets out from his meetings.


Thanks

Thanks Joao. Looks great.


I’ve just thought. We need to completely change the page…. https://hssaustralia.com.au/events/


All the current events need to come out and be replaced with a “online registration form” to capture GP’s data for mailing purposes.


I’ll have a quick word with Heath re this and get back to you


JAMES

Great!


We've now updated the postcard with all the copy.


Regarding the shorten url version, it's now in place. If someone types https://hssaustralia.com.au/ortho will be redirected to the page with the longer url.


Please see artwork attached and let us know if you need anything else.


Thanks

Oops … yes its Sept 15


Yes – please add the logo


JAMES

Hi James,


Thanks, we will add the missing copy to the back of the postcard.


Can I just confirm with you a couple of things:



  • On the email just sent, the date of the event is written as Saturday, May 12th 2018, 8:15am to 5:15pm. Is this correct or should it be Saturday, Sep 15th 2018, 8:00am to 5:00pm?

  • Regarding the RACGP logo image, would you like it to be added to the back of the postal as well?


Thanks
Fwd: POSTCARD.docx

Hi Joao

The reverse of the postcard is incomplete. It should be as follows.

Also – is there any way we can reduce the URL for https://hssaustralia.com.au/latest-techniques-in-orthopaedics/ so that it’s easier for them to type it in?

Maybe www.hssaustralia.com.au/ortho

JAMES

SPECIAL EVENT

Latest techniques in Orthopaedics

Saturday, May 12th 2018, 8:15am to 5:15pm
Hospital for Specialist Surgery
RACGP 40 Points

Limited to just 70 attendees, the event will provide an unprecedented insight into the latest learnings and

techniques available in Orthopaedics.

<< LIMITED AVAILABILITY >>

TO BOOK:

Visit: https://hssaustralia.com.au/latest-techniques-in-orthopaedics/

or

EMAIL: marketing@hssaustralia.com.au

Hi James,


We've updated the A6 postcard. Can you please confirm the changes applied are accurate.


Please see artwork attached.


Thanks.
Fwd: POSTCARD.docx
Fwd: POSTCARD.docx
Fwd: POSTCARD.docx

Begin forwarded message:


From: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>

Subject: FW: POSTCARD.docx

Date: 9 July 2018 at 4:04:33 pm AEST

To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>


Hi Heath …

I must do that postcard. Please action the following …

SIDE 1

Change …April 2018 … to July

Change … to register online now for our monthly EVENT E-NEWSLETTER.

SIDE 2

SPECIAL EVENT

Latest techniques in Orthopaedics

Saturday, May 12th 2018 8:15am to 5:15pm
Hospital for Specialist Surgery
RACGP 40 Points
